Win7 Save Fix:
This worked for me, hopefully it works for you. Very simple.

Step 1: Browse to your Serious Sam HD game install directory as follows: C:\Program Files (x86)\Devolver Digital\Serious Sam HD The First Encounter\Bin\

Step 2: Right click 'SamHD.exe' and select Properties. Click the 'Compatibility' tab and set the Compatibility mode to Windows XP Service Pack 3.

Step 3: Play the game and save to your hearts deepest desires.

Worked for me, good luck.

I'm running XP Pro SP3 and this runs fine.  Do not need to burn to disc, just unzip to a folder then install.  Go to the "Bin" folder in the installed "Serious Sam" folder and replace the installed files with the ones from the Skidrow folder.  Easy!

Downloaded this torrent, absolutely amazing thanks so much :) i decided to try help as much as i can here:

IF IT RUNS STEAM WHEN YOU OPEN:
Go to My Computer, right click and explore the iso file and open the SKIDROW folder. Copy all files from there and put them in the BIN folder of wherever you saved the game, owverwriting when necessary. Then, pin SAMHD to desktop and run that (delete Sam Launcher).

IF YOU CANT SAVE:
When launching from SAMHD, right click and run as administrator every time, this is both loading and saving.

Hope it helps, Flaxe :)

Okay for you who are having troubles installing this I have created you a detailed step-by-step guide to walk you through it here:
Requirements: ISOMounter (PowerIso,Daemon Tools,etc.)
1.Download the torrent.
2.Mount the ISO and run it.
3.The ISO will run the setup and installer application and then it will install Serious Sam HD.
4.Now extract the files from the SKIDROW folder that is in the ISO to this directory:C:\Program Files (x86)\Devolver Digital\Serious Sam HD The First Encounter\Bin
The SeriousSamHDLauncher should be on the desktop,if not go back to the Bin folder of Serious Sam and create a shortcut for the SeriousSamLauncher.
5.Right Click Serious Sam Launcher and click Run As Administrator.
6.Game should work perfectly! Just at the end because the boss battle freezes and no ending :(  But here's the crackfix:Go into AiTB's description and click the 2nd link which has crackfix at the end of the url.Then download this torrent and open the Zipped file with an extractor program such as WinRar. Get the SKIDROW.dll in the winrar file and use this to replace the SKIDROW.dll in the C:\Program Files (x86)\Devolver Digital\Serious Sam HD The First Encounter\Bin

I FIXED THE PROBLEM WITH SAVED GAMES
I FIXED THE PROBLEM WITH SAVED GAMES
I FIXED THE PROBLEM WITH SAVED GAMES

HERE IS THE SOLUTION:
1. Left click "SamHD"
2. Click on "Run as administrator"
You can now save games. 

Also, remember to use "F6" during the game to save your games, it's a quick save button.

Enjoy!
